full_summary:
# Cancelled Government Tender Announcement
## Reference Information

* **Invitation to Tender (ITT) Title**: Cancelled-QU22SLVR
* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01017006
* **Solicitation Number**: QU22SLVR
* **Closing Date**: 31 March 2026, 2:00 p.m. EST
* **GSIN Codes**: 5121A, 5122A, 5123B, 5129B, 5139A, 5139C, 5159B
* **GSIN Description**: Construction of one- and two-dwelling buildings, construction of multi-dwelling buildings, construction of warehouses and industrial buildings, construction of other buildings, construction services, general heavy construction, and other special trade construction work
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Mexico, Canada, Europe, and the United States

## Cancellation Notification
As per this notice, the Invitation to Tender (ITT) has been cancelled.

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Defence Construction Canada
* **Address**: Constitution Square, 19th Floor, 350 Albert Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K3, Canada
* **Email**: mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: 613-859-0549
